titles.title: Technology Investment Incentive Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to shorten the recovery period for the depreciation of certain property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/12/2003--Introduced. Technology Investment Incentive Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) permit the expensing of certain technological equipment and computer software; and (2) include, for recovery purposes, as three-year property certain wireless telecommunications equipment, advanced services equipment, network or network system equipment, and research expenses for software development.
